id.description: Unique identifier for the Regenerative Intent.

actionType.description: Type of regenerative action (e.g., planting, cleaning).

actionDate.description: Date when the action was performed.

location.description: Location where the action was performed (textual description).

numberOfParticipants.description: Number of participants involved in the action.

mediaUrls.description: URLs of media files (images, videos) related to the action.

socialMediaLinks.description: Links to social media posts related to the action.

responsibleName.description: Name of the person responsible for the action.

projectName.description: Name of the project or collective (if applicable).

customTag.description: Custom tag created by the user for the action.

autoGeneratedTag.description: Auto-generated tag for the action if no custom tag is provided.

certificateRequested.description: Indicates whether a digital certificate was requested.

submissionDate.description: Date and time when the intent was submitted.

status.description: Status of the intent (e.g., pending, verified, rejected).

UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public profile information.

avatarUrl.description: URL for the user's avatar image.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public information for each user.

/regenerative_intents/{intentId}.description: Stores submitted regenerative intents. Admin users can read and modify these intents.
